permissionkey.name: View
permissionkey.description: Can see a page exists and read its content.

permissionkey.name: View Versions
permissionkey.description: Can view the page versions dialog and read past versions of a page.

permissionkey.name: View Page in Sitemap
permissionkey.description: Controls whether a user can see a page in the sitemap or intelligent search.

permissionkey.name: Preview Page As User
permissionkey.description: Ability to see what this page will look like at a specific time in the future as a specific user.

permissionkey.name: Edit Properties
permissionkey.description: Ability to change anything in the Page Properties menu.

permissionkey.name: Edit Contents
permissionkey.description: Ability to make edits to at least some of the content in the page. You can lock down different block areas and specific blocks by clicking Permissions on them as well.

permissionkey.name: Edit Speed Settings
permissionkey.description: Ability to change caching settings.

permissionkey.name: Change Theme
permissionkey.description: Ability to change just the theme for this page.

permissionkey.name: Change Page Type
permissionkey.description: Ability to change just the page type for this page, also check out Theme permissions.

permissionkey.name: Edit Permissions
permissionkey.description: Ability to change permissions for this page. Warning: by granting this a user could give themselves more access.

permissionkey.name: Delete
permissionkey.description: Ability to move this page to the site's Trash.

permissionkey.name: Delete Versions
permissionkey.description: Ability to remove old versions of this page.

permissionkey.name: Approve Changes
permissionkey.description: Can publish an unapproved version of the page.

permissionkey.name: Add Sub-Page
permissionkey.description: Can add a page beneath the current page.

permissionkey.name: Move or Copy Page
permissionkey.description: Can move or copy this page to another location.

permissionkey.name: Schedule Guest Access
permissionkey.description: Can control scheduled guest access to this page.

permissionkey.name: Add Block
permissionkey.description: Can add a block to any area on the site. If someone is added here they can add blocks to any area (unless that area has permissions that override these global permissions.)

permissionkey.name: Add Stack
permissionkey.description: Can add a stack or block from a stack to any area on the site. If someone is added here they can add stacks to any area (unless that area has permissions that override these global permissions.)

permissionkey.name: View Area
permissionkey.description: Can view the area and its contents.

permissionkey.name: Edit Area Contents
permissionkey.description: Can edit blocks within this area.

permissionkey.name: Add Block to Area
permissionkey.description: Can add blocks to this area. This setting overrides the global Add Block permission for this area.

permissionkey.name: Add Stack to Area
permissionkey.description: Can add stacks to this area. This setting overrides the global Add Stack permission for this area.

permissionkey.name: Add Layouts to Area
permissionkey.description: Controls whether users get the ability to add layouts to a particular area.

permissionkey.name: Edit Area Design
permissionkey.description: Controls whether users see design controls and can modify an area's custom CSS.

permissionkey.name: Edit Area Permissions
permissionkey.description: Controls whether users can access the permissions on an area. Custom area permissions could override those of the page.

permissionkey.name: Delete Area Contents
permissionkey.description: Controls whether users can delete blocks from this area.

permissionkey.name: Schedule Guest Access
permissionkey.description: Controls whether users can schedule guest access permissions on blocks in this area. Guest Access is a shortcut for granting permissions just to the Guest Group.

permissionkey.name: View Block
permissionkey.description: Controls whether users can view this block in the page.

permissionkey.name: Edit Block
permissionkey.description: Controls whether users can edit this block. This overrides any area or page permissions.

permissionkey.name: Change Custom Template
permissionkey.description: Controls whether users can change the custom template on this block. This overrides any area or page permissions.

permissionkey.name: Delete Block
permissionkey.description: Controls whether users can delete this block. This overrides any area or page permissions.

permissionkey.name: Edit Design
permissionkey.description: Controls whether users can set custom design properties or CSS on this block.

permissionkey.name: Edit Permissions
permissionkey.description: Controls whether users can change permissions on this block, potentially granting themselves or others greater access.

permissionkey.name: Schedule Guest Access
permissionkey.description: Controls whether users can schedule guest access permissions on this block. Guest Access is a shortcut for granting permissions just to the Guest Group.

permissionkey.name: View Files
permissionkey.description: Can view and download files in the site.

permissionkey.name: Search Files in File Manager
permissionkey.description: Can access the file manager

permissionkey.name: Edit File Properties
permissionkey.description: Can edit a file's properties.

permissionkey.name: Edit File Contents
permissionkey.description: Can edit or replace files in set.

permissionkey.name: Copy File
permissionkey.description: Can copy files in file set.

permissionkey.name: Edit File Access
permissionkey.description: Can edit access to file sets.

permissionkey.name: Delete File Set
permissionkey.description: Can delete file set.

permissionkey.name: Delete File
permissionkey.description: Can delete files in set.

permissionkey.name: Add File
permissionkey.description: Can add files to set.

permissionkey.name: View Files
permissionkey.description: Can view and download files.

permissionkey.name: View File in File Manager
permissionkey.description: Can access the File Manager.

permissionkey.name: Edit File Properties
permissionkey.description: Can edit a file's properties.

permissionkey.name: Edit File Contents
permissionkey.description: Can edit or replace files.

permissionkey.name: Copy File
permissionkey.description: Can copy file.

permissionkey.name: Edit File Access
permissionkey.description: Can edit access to file.

permissionkey.name: Delete File
permissionkey.description: Can delete file.

permissionkey.name: Approve or Deny
permissionkey.description: Grant ability to approve workflow.

permissionkey.name: Notify on Entry
permissionkey.description: Notify approvers that a change has entered the workflow.

permissionkey.name: Notify on Approve
permissionkey.description: Notify approvers that a change has been approved.

permissionkey.name: Notify on Deny
permissionkey.description: Notify approvers that a change has been denied.

permissionkey.name: Export Site Users
permissionkey.description: Controls whether a user can export site users or not
